metadata.title: CVE-2024-45491 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.3. dtdCopy in xmlparse.c canhave an integer overflow for nDefaultAtts on 32-bit platforms (whereUINT_MAX equals SIZE_MAX).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-45491` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

expat - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm9
lib64expat1 - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm9
libexpat1 - 2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

libxmltok1 - 1.2-3ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm4
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: expat package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.0-7ubuntu0.16.04.5+esm9').
xmlrpc-c package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
vnc4 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
wbxml2 package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
swish-e package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.

libxmltok package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2-3ubuntu0.16.04.1~esm4').
